qcfpunch:Defend_Weakest.NAME: Weakest Block
qcfpunch:Defend_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Ethereal.

qcfpunch:Strike_Weakest.NAME: Weakest Strike
qcfpunch:Strike_Weakest.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ethereal.

qcfpunch:WeakestEnergyBlast.NAME: Weakest Energy Blast
qcfpunch:WeakestEnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1/3 qcfpunch:Potential.  NL Ethereal.

qcfpunch:WeakestFlyingKick.NAME: Weakest Flying Kick
qcfpunch:WeakestFlyingKick.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ethereal.

qcfpunch:WeakestProvocation.NAME: Weakest Provocation
qcfpunch:WeakestProvocation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain 1/3 qcfpunch:Potential. NL Ethereal.

qcfpunch:WeakestTaunt.NAME: Weakest Taunt
qcfpunch:WeakestTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Gain 1/3 qcfpunch:Potential. NL Ethereal.
